title: [1.16+] 关于炼药锅等级检测
author: 阡喏
txt_content:
本帖最后由 阡喏 于 2020-4-25 10:21 编辑 

情况如下:我在一个炼药锅的位置设置了一个隐形盔甲架，如果我检测这个炼药锅:当此锅等级为3或2级时给盔甲架加can的标签，当此锅等级不等于3或2级时给盔甲架除去can标签，这样一级时则不能拥有can标签


加can标签的很简单
execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=3] run tag @s add can复制代码execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=2] run tag @s add can复制代码

现在的问题是:
① execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s unless block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=3] run tag @s remove can复制代码② execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s unless block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=2] run tag @s remove can复制代码锅为1级，①②都通过，可以去掉can标签
但如果锅为2级，那么①通过，如果锅为3级，那么②就通过，这样无论锅是多少级，都不能拥有can标签
所以   求解

replies.author: llc1
replies.txt_content:
重复执行 无条件 始终执行：execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=3] run tag @s add can
重复执行 无条件 始终执行：execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=2] run tag @s add can
重复执行 无条件 始终执行：execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=1] run tag @s remove can

replies.author: Y制杖杖
replies.txt_content:
先执行tag @e[type=arrmor_stand] remove can复制代码
再执行execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=3] run tag @s add can
execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=2] run tag @s add can复制代码

replies.author: Ruainbow_
replies.txt_content:
将remove的unless条件合并即可，此时有任意条件不通过（等于2或3）时都不会remove这个标签。
execute as @e[type=arrmor_stand] at @s unless block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=3] unless block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:cauldron[level=2] run tag @s remove can
